original_title: 2022 O/L results to be released within three days – Edu. Minister
original_body_lines: Minister of Education Susil Premajayantha says that the results of 2022 G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination will be released within the next two or three days.
The Education Minister revealed this while speaking to the media following an event held in Colombo.
Furthermore, Premajayantha emphasized that all necessary arrangements have been made in order to hold the 2023 G.C.E. Ordinary Level examination in May or June, 2024.
